2013-09-06 17:18:27,699 [11200] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('undefined')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-06 17:18:29,292 [12620] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_checkDetail')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_dealDetail')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid

2013-09-06 17:22:54,135 [12620] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_deal')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-06 17:27:39,005 [11200] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('undefined')

						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_direct')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

2013-09-06 17:35:56,190 [12600] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')
2013-09-06 17:36:00,048 [7496] DEBUG Mms - SELECT Name as TableName FROM sys.tables order by Name

						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_dealDetail')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_buildPart')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-06 17:48:32,729 [12600] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_buildPart')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_buildPart')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode

and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_dealDetail')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('undefined')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-06 17:54:55,915 [6776] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('undefined')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('undefined')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

2013-09-06 17:59:32,877 [12620] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')

						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_buildPart')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-06 18:08:58,496 [11200] DEBUG Servicesys_user - 获取实体对象
2013-09-06 18:08:58,515 [11200] DEBUG Sys - select sys_user.* from sys_user where  UserCode =  'lhs'and Password =  'lhs'and IsEnable =  'True'
2013-09-06 18:08:58,553 [11200] DEBUG Sys - 
update sys_user
set LoginCount = isnull(LoginCount,0) + 1
   ,LastLoginDate = getdate()
where UserCode = 'lhs' 
2013-09-06 18:08:58,577 [11200] DEBUG Sys - insert into sys_loginHistory([UserCode],[UserName],[HostName],[HostIP],[LoginCity],[LoginDate]) values('lhs','刘会胜','LHS-PC','ILData[0]/localhost','福建省厦门市','2013-09-06 18:08:58')
2013-09-06 18:08:58,580 [11200] DEBUG Servicemms_project - 获取实体对象
2013-09-06 18:08:58,580 [11200] DEBUG Mms - select mms_project.* from mms_project where  ProjectCode =  '201306030001'
2013-09-06 18:08:58,778 [12232] DEBUG Sys - select * from sys_userSetting where UserCode='lhs'
2013-09-06 18:09:02,046 [6776] DEBUG Sys - 
--角色的菜单
select distinct B.*
from sys_roleMenuMap A
inner join sys_menu  B on B.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.IsEnable='1'
  and RoleCode in (
  select RoleCode from sys_userRoleMap where UserCode = 'lhs' --用户的角色
union all
  select RoleCode from sys_organizeRoleMap where OrganizeCode in  --机构的角色
  (
	select OrganizeCode from sys_userOrganizeMap where UserCode = 'lhs'
  )  
)
order by B.MenuSeq,B.MenuCode
2013-09-06 18:09:05,390 [7496] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')
2013-09-06 18:09:09,966 [6992] DEBUG Mms - SELECT Name as TableName FROM sys.tables order by Name
2013-09-06 18:09:09,985 [12232] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('undefined')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id

						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_deal')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id

2013-09-06 18:11:49,789 [12992] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Sys/generator/Index','/Sys/generator')
2013-09-06 18:11:53,929 [404] DEBUG Mms - SELECT Name as TableName FROM sys.tables order by Name

		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_direct')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 from   syscolumns

						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_material')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id
2013-09-06 18:16:30,990 [3316] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_direct')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_directDetail')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

2013-09-06 23:04:03,312 [13052] DEBUG Sys - 
--角色的菜单
select distinct B.*
from sys_roleMenuMap A
inner join sys_menu  B on B.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.IsEnable='1'
  and RoleCode in (
  select RoleCode from sys_userRoleMap where UserCode = 'lhs' --用户的角色
union all
  select RoleCode from sys_organizeRoleMap where OrganizeCode in  --机构的角色
  (
	select OrganizeCode from sys_userOrganizeMap where UserCode = 'lhs'
  )  
)
order by B.MenuSeq,B.MenuCode
2013-09-06 23:04:36,301 [9460] DEBUG Sys - 
select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Mms/productTest/Index','/Mms/productTest')

2013-09-06 23:08:26,832 [4384] DEBUG Mms - 
SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('undefined')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_direct')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

						 from   syscolumns

						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_direct')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

SELECT	sys.columns.name						AS ColumnName, 
		type_name(sys.columns.system_type_id)	AS SqlTypeName,
		sys.columns.max_length					AS MaxLength,
		sys.columns.is_nullable					AS IsNullable,
		sys.columns.is_identity					AS IsIdentity,
		(case when exists(select 1  
						 from   syscolumns 
						 join   sysindexkeys on syscolumns.id  =sysindexkeys.id and syscolumns.colid=sysindexkeys.colid and syscolumns.id=sys.columns.object_id 
						 join   sysindexes   on syscolumns.id  =sysindexes.id   and sysindexkeys.indid=sysindexes.indid   
						 join   sysobjects   on sysindexes.name=sysobjects.name and sysobjects.xtype= 'PK '
						 where syscolumns.name = sys.columns.name) then 1 else 0 end) AS IsPrimaryKey,
		(select value from sys.extended_properties where sys.extended_properties.major_id = sys.columns.object_id and sys.extended_properties.minor_id = sys.columns.column_id) as Description
FROM sys.columns    
WHERE sys.columns.object_id = object_id('mms_directDetail')
ORDER BY sys.columns.column_id

select 1
from sys_roleMenuMap A
left join sys_userRoleMap B on B.RoleCode = A.RoleCode
left join sys_menu C on C.MenuCode = A.MenuCode
where B.UserCode = 'lhs'
and C.URL in ('/Mms/productTest/Index','/Mms/productTest')
